titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning auricular confession as it is prescribed by the Council of Trent, and practised in the Church of Rome : with a post-script on occasion of a book lately printed in France, called Historia confessionis auricularis.
titleStmt.author: Goodman, John, 1625 or 6-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hills Jun. for Benj. Tooke ..., and Fincham Gardiner ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
